editorialNote.content: The title of this Notice was amended from “Declaration of Markets in the Regional Council Area” to “Declaration of Markets Notice” — see 78 of 1999 s. 7.

section.name: s
section.content: The markets specified in the Schedule hereto are declared to be markets to which the principal Ordinance applies.
